system.requirements:
Tier 3: Astropath E.Adv, Warp Lock
Aptitudes: Willpower, Defence
system.effect: Astropath can spend a Fate Point to negate the result of a Psychic Phenomena they rolled, including a result of Perils of the Warp. However, they cannot use the Focus Power action or sustain any Psychic Powers until the start of their next turn.

description.value: Astropath can spend a Fate Point to negate the result of a Psychic Phenomena they rolled, including a result of Perils of the Warp. However, they cannot use the Focus Power action or sustain any Psychic Powers until the start of their next turn.
